text: tavada muhammad dutayeku misa (venat kenek) nove. ohuta pera dharma dutayin ikut vi giyaha. (ovun aturin) kenek miya giye nam ho ghatanaya karanu læbuve nam ho numbala numbalage vilumbu matin apasu hæri giyehuya. tavada kavareku tama vilumbu deka matin hæri yanne da evita allahta kisivakin haniyak sidu novanne ma ya. allah krtavedi ayata pratiphala denu æta
